Item.Value: [Name:First][Text:It's not good for monsters to be this close to your town.]
[Name:Engage][Text:You look like you know what you're doing. Care to join me in taking this thing down?]
[Text:Ready for what? I know you're skilled with that sword of yours, but every time you leave the house with it, I'm so afraid.]
[Text:So what? You'd rather I just cower in fear the next time monsters raid the town? No, I won't do that.]
[Text:... We'll talk about this later, we have a guest. Is that you $Name$? I'm sorry you had to see that. What can I help you with?]
